short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create user groups to filter your Home Activity feed efficiently

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you will be able to organize the people you follow from anilist into various groups, and use these groups to filter the activity feed in your home page in a quick and easy way. Perfect for people who follow hundreds of people who want to separate the activity summary.

All the main options and functionalities are integrated into the anilist website itself, following the personalized style of the page so as not to hinder the user experience.
